Question.Subject: how can i browse WAP site?
Question.Content: hi guy i just want to know that how can browse wap site and download it's content through my computer web browser
Question.ChosenAnswer:
WAP site is made browsing through mobile phone. You can browse WAP sites in your computer using any of this browser – Winwap – http://www.winwap.com/ Opera – http://www.opera.com/ Firefox with wmlbrowser plugin installed
When u opening WAP sites from browser like Opera/firefox u need to enter site address as wap.sitename.com or m.sitename.com

Answer.Content:
WAP site is made browsing through mobile phone. You can browse WAP sites in your computer using any of this browser – Winwap – http://www.winwap.com/ Opera – http://www.opera.com/ Firefox with wmlbrowser plugin installed
When u opening WAP sites from browser like Opera/firefox u need to enter site address as wap.sitename.com or m.sitename.com
just download and install opera browser it will help u to surf web fastest way
